mapper.select: /* [TdspTmplInf.xml][selectTdspTmplInfMappingInfoList][템플릿 리스트 조회 (메뉴 매핑여부 포함)][TANINE] */ SELECT ST.MNU_SEQ AS MNU_SEQ , ST.TMPL_SEQ AS TMPL_SEQ , ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ AS UP_TMPL_SEQ , ST.TMPL_NM AS TMPL_NM , ST.TMPL_TP_CD AS TMPL_TP_CD , ST.TMPL_URL AS TMPL_URL , ST.DSPLY_NO AS DSPLY_NO , ST.US_YN AS US_YN , CASE WHEN TMPL_TP_CD = '1' AND MNU_SEQ = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE CASE WHEN MNU_SEQ = 0 AND UP_TMPL_SEQ = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END END AS MAPPED_YN FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF ST WHERE ST.US_YN = 'Y'

/* [TdspTmplInf.xml][selectTdspTmplInfDispFrontMenuList][Front 템플릿 전시 메뉴 조회(1/2Depth)][TANINE] */ SELECT A.TMPL_SEQ , A.UP_TMPL_SEQ , A.TMPL_TP_CD , A.MNU_SEQ , A.MNU_NM , A.MNU_DPH , A.UP_DSPLY_NO , A.DSPLY_NO , A.TMPL_URL , A.LGN_ESN_YN , A.MNU_YN , A.MNU_TP_CD /* , A.SITE_NO 2019-02-17 pandora3.2에서 쓰이는 컬럼*/ FROM ( SELECT CAST(TY.REF_1 AS UNSIGNED) AS MNU_DPH , STU.DSPLY_NO AS UP_DSPLY_NO , ST.DSPLY_NO AS DSPLY_NO , TY.MST_CD AS MST_CD , TY.CD AS CD , TY.REF_1 AS REF_1 , TY.REF_2 AS REF_2 , TY.REF_3 AS REF_3 , ST.TMPL_SEQ AS TMPL_SEQ , ST.MODL_SEQ AS MODL_SEQ , ST.DSPLY_YN AS DSPLY_YN , ST.MN_CTS_DESC AS MN_CTS_DESC , ST.US_YN AS US_YN , ST.TMPL_TP_CD AS TMPL_TP_CD , STU.TMPL_SEQ AS UP_TMPL_SEQ , STU.TMPL_TP_CD AS UP_TMPL_TP_CD , SM.MNU_NM AS MNU_NM , SM.TMPL_URL AS TMPL_URL , ST.MNU_SEQ AS MNU_SEQ , ST.LGN_ESN_YN AS LGN_ESN_YN , SM.MNU_YN AS MNU_YN , SM.MNU_TP_CD AS MNU_TP_CD /* , SM.SITE_NO pandora3.2에 쓰이는 컬럼 주석처리*/ FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF ST LEFT JOIN TDSP_TMPL_INF STU ON STU.TMPL_SEQ = ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT MST_CD , CD , REF_1 , REF_2 , REF_3 FROM TCMN_CD_DTL WHERE MST_CD = 'TMP_TYPE' ) TY ON ( TY.CD = ST.TMPL_TP_CD AND ST.US_YN = 'Y'AND ST.DSPLY_YN = 'Y' ) LEFT JOIN TSYS_ADM_MNU SM ON SM.MNU_SEQ = ST.MNU_SEQ ) A WHERE A.MNU_DPH < 3 AND A.MN_CTS_DESC IS NULL AND A.MNU_SEQ IS NOT NULL /* AND A.SITE_NO = #{sys_cd, jdbcType=NUMERIC} pandora3.2에 쓰이는 컬럼 주석 처리*/ ORDER BY A.MNU_DPH, A.UP_DSPLY_NO, A.DSPLY_NO

/* [TdspTmplInf.xml][selectTdspTmplInfDispFrontMenu3DptList][Front 템플릿 전시 메뉴 조회(3Depth 한정)][TANINE] */ SELECT A.MNU_NM , A.TMPL_SEQ , A.TMPL_URL , A.UP_TMPL_SEQ , A.DSPLY_NO , A.UP_MNU_NM , A.LGN_ESN_YN , A.TMPL_TP_CD , A.UP_TMPL_TP_CD FROM ( SELECT STU.DSPLY_NO AS UP_DSPLY_NO , STU.TMPL_TP_CD AS UP_TMPL_TP_CD , ST.TMPL_TP_CD AS TMPL_TP_CD , ST.DSPLY_NO AS DSPLY_NO , ST.TMPL_NM AS TMPL_NM , ST.TMPL_SEQ AS TMPL_SEQ , SM.TMPL_URL AS TMPL_URL , ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ AS UP_TMPL_SEQ , SM.MNU_SEQ AS MNU_SEQ , SM.MNU_NM AS MNU_NM , (SELECT MNU_NM FROM TSYS_ADM_MNU WHERE STU.MNU_SEQ = MNU_SEQ) AS UP_MNU_NM , ST.LGN_ESN_YN AS LGN_ESN_YN FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF ST LEFT JOIN TDSP_TMPL_INF STU ON STU.TMPL_SEQ = ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ LEFT JOIN TSYS_ADM_MNU SM ON SM.MNU_SEQ = ST.MNU_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND ST.US_YN = 'Y' AND ST.DSPLY_YN = 'Y' AND SM.FRNT_YN = 'Y' ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.UP_TMPL_SEQ = #{tmpl_seq ,JDBCTYPE=NUMERIC} ORDER BY A.UP_DSPLY_NO, A.DSPLY_NO

/* [TdspTmplInf.xml][selectTdspTmplInfRecipientEmail][이메일 받는 사람 조회][TANINE] */ SELECT DTL.REF_1 AS REF_1 FROM TCMN_CD_MST MST , TCMN_CD_DTL DTL WHERE MST.MST_CD = DTL.MST_CD AND MST.MST_CD = 'REC_EMAIL' AND DTL.CD = #{flg} LIMIT 1

/* [TdspTmplInf.xml][selectTdspTmplInfDocLocationInfo][게시글 이동 정보][TANINE] */ SELECT T.TMPL_SEQ , T.TMPL_TP_CD , CASE WHEN T.TMPL_TP_CD = 4 THEN NULL ELSE T.UP_TMPL_TP_CD END UP_TMPL_TP_CD , CASE WHEN T.TMPL_TP_CD = 4 THEN NULL ELSE T.UP_TMPL_SEQ END UP_TMPL_SEQ , T.TMPL_URL , T.UP_TMPL_URL FROM ( SELECT ST.TMPL_SEQ AS TMPL_SEQ , ST.TMPL_TP_CD AS TMPL_TP_CD , ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ AS UP_TMPL_SEQ , (SELECT TMPL_TP_CD FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF WHERE TMPL_SEQ = ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ) AS UP_TMPL_TP_CD , (SELECT TMPL_URL FROM TSYS_ADM_MNU WHERE MNU_SEQ = (SELECT MNU_SEQ FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF WHERE TMPL_SEQ = ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ) ) AS UP_TMPL_URL , (SELECT S1.TMPL_URL FROM TSYS_ADM_MNU S1 WHERE S1.MNU_SEQ = ST.MNU_SEQ) AS TMPL_URL FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF ST WHERE TMPL_SEQ = #{tmpl_seq ,JDBCTYPE=NUMERIC} ) T

/* [TdspTmplInf.xml][selectTdspTmplInfMpnModlList][모듈이 매핑가능한 템플릿 목록 조회][TANINE] */ SELECT TMPL_SEQ , (SELECT T1.MNU_NM FROM TSYS_ADM_MNU T1 WHERE T1.MNU_SEQ = S1.MNU_SEQ) AS MNU_NM FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.TMPL_TP_CD IN (4,6) AND S1.MNU_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND S1.MODL_SEQ IS NULL
UNION SELECT S1.TMP_SEQ AS TMPL_SEQ , (SELECT T1.MNU_NM FROM TSYS_ADM_MNU T1 WHERE T1.MNU_SEQ = S2.MNU_SEQ) AS MNU_NM FROM TBBS_MODL_INF S1 , TDSP_TMPL_INF S2 WHERE S1.TMP_SEQ = S2.TMPL_SEQ AND S1.MODL_SEQ = #{modl_seq ,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

/* [TdspTmplInf.xml][selectTdspTmplInfDispTreeList][전시 메뉴 목록 조회][TANINE] */ SELECT ST.TMPL_TP_CD AS TMPL_TP_CD -- 템플릿유형코드 , (SELECT S1.TMPL_TP_CD FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF S1 WHERE S1.TMPL_SEQ = ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ) AS UPP_TMPL_TP_CD -- 상위 템플릿유형코드 , FM.URL AS URL -- 템플릿URL , ST.TMPL_URL AS TMPL_URL -- 템플릿URL , ST.DSPLY_NO AS DSPLY_NO -- 전시번호 , ST.DSPLY_YN AS DSPLY_YN -- 전시여부 , ST.MNU_SEQ AS MNU_SEQ -- 메뉴순번 , FM.MNU_YN AS MNU_YN -- 메뉴 여부 , CAST(TY.REF_1 AS UNSIGNED) AS MNU_DPH -- 메뉴 레벨 , TY.REF_2 AS CHD_YN -- 하위메뉴여부 , ST.TMPL_SEQ AS id -- ZTREE REQUIRED , ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ AS pId -- ZTREE REQUIRED , FM.MNU_NM AS name -- ZTREE REQUIRED , CASE WHEN CAST(TY.REF_1 AS UNSIGNED) > 1 THEN 'FALSE' ELSE 'TRUE' END AS open -- ZTREE REQUIRED , CASE WHEN TY.REF_2 = 'Y' THEN 'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END AS isParent -- ZTREE REQUIRED , 'Y' AS isSaved -- DB저장 확인 플래그 , FM.SYS_CD , FM.US_YN FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF ST LEFT JOIN (SELECT MNU_NM, MNU_SEQ, MNU_YN, URL, SYS_CD, US_YN FROM TSYS_ADM_MNU WHERE FRNT_YN = 'Y') FM ON FM.MNU_SEQ = ST.MNU_SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT MST_CD, CD, REF_1, REF_2 FROM TCMN_CD_DTL WHERE MST_CD = 'TMP_TYPE') TY ON TY.CD = ST.TMPL_TP_CD WHERE 1=1 AND ST.DSPLY_YN = 'Y' AND IF( ST.TMPL_TP_CD = 1, 'Y', (SELECT S1.DSPLY_YN FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF S1 WHERE S1.TMPL_SEQ = ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ) ) = 'Y' AND ST.MNU_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND FM.SYS_CD = #{sys_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CAST(TY.REF_1 AS UNSIGNED), ST.DSPLY_NO, ST.UP_TMPL_SEQ, ST.TMPL_SEQ
mapper.update: /* [TdspTmplInf.xml]["updateTdspTmplInfMpn"][템플릿 매핑 초기화 ][TANINE] */ UPDATE TDSP_TMPL_INF SET UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE() , UPDR_ID = #{updr_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UP_TMPL_SEQ = 0 , MNU_SEQ = 0 , DSPLY_NO = NULL WHERE TMPL_SEQ IN ( SELECT B.tmpl_seq FROM ( SELECT TMPL_SEQ FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF WHERE MNU_SEQ = #{mnu_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} OR UP_TMPL_SEQ IN (SELECT TMPL_SEQ FROM ( SELECT TMPL_SEQ FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF WHERE MNU_SEQ = #{mnu_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) AS tem_a ) OR UP_TMPL_SEQ IN (SELECT tmpl_seq FROM ( SELECT tmpl_seq FROM tdsp_tmpl_inf WHERE up_tmpl_seq IN (SELECT tmpl_seq FROM tdsp_tmpl_inf WHERE mnu_seq = #{mnu_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) ) AS tmp_b ) ) B )
mapper.select: /* [TdspTmplInf.xml][select1DepthMnuInf][1뎁스 메뉴 정보 조회][TANINE] */ SELECT TT1.TMPL_SEQ AS UP_TMPL_SEQ , TT2.MNU_NM AS UP_MNU_NM FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF TT1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT MNU_SEQ , MNU_NM , SYS_CD FROM TSYS_ADM_MNU WHERE FRNT_YN = 'Y' AND US_YN = 'Y') TT2 ON TT1.MNU_SEQ = TT2.MNU_SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT CD , REF_1 FROM TCMN_CD_DTL WHERE MST_CD = 'TMP_TYPE' AND US_YN = 'Y') TT3 ON TT1.TMPL_TP_CD = TT3.CD WHERE TT1.US_YN = 'Y' AND TT1.DSPLY_YN = 'Y' AND TT1.MNU_SEQ != '' AND TT1.MNU_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND IFNULL(TT1.MNU_SEQ, '') != '' AND (CASE WHEN TT1.TMPL_TP_CD = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE (SELECT IFNULL(SS1.DSPLY_YN, 'N') FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF SS1 WHERE SS1.TMPL_SEQ = TT1.UP_TMPL_SEQ) END) = 'Y' AND TT3.REF_1 = '1' AND TT1.TMPL_SEQ IN (SELECT T1.UP_TMPL_SEQ FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT MNU_SEQ , SYS_CD FROM TSYS_ADM_MNU WHERE FRNT_YN = 'Y' AND US_YN = 'Y') T2 ON T1.MNU_SEQ = T2.MNU_SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT CD , REF_1 FROM TCMN_CD_DTL WHERE MST_CD = 'TMP_TYPE' AND US_YN = 'Y') T3 ON T1.TMPL_TP_CD = T3.CD WHERE T1.US_YN = 'Y' AND T1.DSPLY_YN = 'Y' AND T1.MNU_SEQ != '' AND T1.MNU_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND IFNULL(T1.MNU_SEQ, '') != '' AND (CASE WHEN T1.TMPL_TP_CD = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE (SELECT IFNULL(S1.DSPLY_YN, 'N') FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF S1 WHERE S1.TMPL_SEQ = T1.UP_TMPL_SEQ) END) = 'Y' AND T3.REF_1 = '2' AND T2.SYS_CD = #{sys_cd, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND T1.TMPL_SEQ = #{tmpl_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) LIMIT 1
